Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) systems provide efficient and clean power.
Titulo: First principles study of Cr poisoning in solid oxide Application to (La,Sr) CoO3

Sentencas: Chromium poisoning is known to deteriorate the performance of the SOFC cathodes such as La1-x Sr CoO3 (LSCO) due to the formation of undesired products.
Titulo: First principles study of Cr poisoning in solid oxide Application to (La,Sr) CoO3

Sentencas: We identify the reaction products when LSCO is in a CrO3 and O-2 atmosphere using first principle thermodynamics, with the assumption that gas-phase CrO3 is the Cr source.
Titulo: First principles study of Cr poisoning in solid oxide Application to (La,Sr) CoO3

Sentencas: Our results correctly identify SrCrO4 as the primary Cr poisoning product as observed in experiments and also provides temperature-pressure regimes under which Cr poisoning effects may be avoided.
Titulo: First principles study of Cr poisoning in solid oxide Application to (La,Sr) CoO3
